summary:
"Fiddler on the Roof" is a popular musical set in Russia around 1905. It tells the story of Tevye, a Jewish milkman, and his struggle to keep his family's traditions alive as they face outside changes. Tevye's daughters want to marry for love, which causes him worry. The musical also shows how the family is forced to leave their home due to the tsar's orders.

First performed in 1964, it became a huge hit on Broadway, running for over 3,000 performances. It won many awards and has been made into a movie and performed by schools and communities worldwide.
title: Fiddler on the Roof
